about.story_p1: Shanta Ayurveda Hospital was founded with a vision to provide authentic Ayurvedic healthcare that combines traditional wisdom with modern medical facilities. Over the past years, we have grown from a small clinic to a leading Ayurvedic hospital in Kerala.
about.story_p2: Our founders, inspired by the ancient healing traditions of Ayurveda, established this institution to make authentic Panchakarma and other traditional treatments accessible to everyone seeking natural healing.
about.story_p3: Today, we are proud to have treated over 15,000 patients from across India and around the world, helping them achieve optimal health through personalized Ayurvedic care.
about.mission_text: To provide authentic, high-quality Ayurvedic healthcare that promotes natural healing and builds trust. We aim to promote wellness through Panchakarma and other traditional treatments, incorporating modern research results of Ayurveda masters.
about.vision_text: To become the most trusted and sought-after Ayurvedic healthcare provider, recognized globally for our commitment to authentic treatments, patient care, and holistic wellness.

welcomeSection.p1: Dr. Devi Saravanya (B.S.M.S.) is an expert with 15 years of experience in herbal medicine, who has treated over 15,000 patients and specializes in resolving women's health issues through her family's traditional Siddha and Ayurveda medical practice.
welcomeSection.p2: Her treatment focuses not just on the symptoms, but on identifying and completely eliminating the root cause of the disease. The herbal medicines she provides naturally and gradually enhance the body's immunity power.

mission.label: Our Mission
mission.p1: To provide authentic, high-quality herbal and Ayurvedic healthcare that promotes natural healing and holistic wellness. We strive to preserve traditional healing wisdom while incorporating modern medical knowledge for the benefit of our patients.
mission.p2: Our commitment extends beyond treatment — we aim to educate, empower, and support each patient on their journey to optimal health through natural, time-tested remedies and personalized care.
